resources.string: Ukuze kunikwe amandla, hamba ku-att.com/mywireless noma shayela ku-611
Inethiwekhi ayitholakali. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Isevisi ayisekelwe. Sicela uxhumane nomhlinzeki wakho wesevisi.
Inethiwekhi ayitholakali. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Ukuze usebenzise i-hotspot yeselula, sicela ushayele isevisi yekhasimende ukuze ubhalise.
Inethiwekhi ayitholakali. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Ayikwazi ukwenza kusebenze ukushaya kwe-WiFi. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Ayikwazi ukubuyekeza ikheli lamanje lesimo esiphuthumayo ngalesi sikhathi. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Ukuqinisekisa kuhlulekile. Sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhathi.
Sicela ulinde ngenkathi silungisa ifoni yakho.
Ukuze kuqaliswe, faka amadijithi angu-4 okugcina enombolo yokuvikeleka komphakathi kwe-akhawunti yakho yomnikazi:
Ukuze kuqaliswe, faka iphasiwedi yenkokhelo ye-akhawunti yakho:
Sebenzisa inombolo yokuvikela komphakathi esikhundleni salokho

"Ngaphambi kokuthi wenze kusebenze le foni, yenza isipele oxhumana nabo uphinde uvale ifoni yakho endala.
Uma uqala ukwenza kusebenze, sizodlulisela inombolo yakho kule foni siphinde senze kungasasebenzi ifoni yakho endala."
Ukuze udlulisele inombolo yakho yefoni kufoni yakho entsha, ifoni yakho endala kumele ivalwe.
Ifoni yakho ye-Verizon manje iyasebenza. Inombolo yakho ingu-%1$s
Ukusetshenziswa kwedatha yakho manje kukhawulelwe ngenxa yesikhathi sosuku noma umkhawulo wedatha. Kuzomele usebenzise i-Wi-Fi ukuze uqhubeke usethe idivayisi yakho.
Ngenxa yesikhathi sosuku noma umkhawulo wedatha
Awunalo uhlelo olungenantambo lwe-Verizon noma usebenzise konke ukuvunyelwa kwakho kohlelo, sicela uxhumane ne-Verizon
Thepha ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho
Xhumana ne-Verizon ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho.
Qiniseka ukuthi unesignali enhle (amabha amaningi) uphinde uzame futhi. Uma le nkinga iqhubeka, sicela uxhumane nesevisi yekhasimende ku-(800) 922-0204 ukuze uthole usizo.
Uxolo, sinenkinga yokwenza kusebenze ifoni yakho. Xhumana nesevisi yekhasimende ku-(800) 922-0204.
Inombolo yokuvikela kwezomphakathi ayifani. Sicela uzame futhi.
Iphasiwedi yenkokhelo ayifani. Sicela uzame futhi.
Uxolo, sinenkinga yokwenza kusebenze ifoni yakho. Xhumana nesevisi yekhasimende ku-(800) 922-0204.
Ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho, shayela ku-(800) 922-0204 kusukela kwenye ifoni.
Ukuze wenze kusebenze ifoni yakho, landela imiyalo efakwe nefoni yakho entsha noma xhumana nomqondisi we-Verizon Wireless kunhlangano yakho.
Uxolo, sinenkinga yokwenza kusebenze ifoni yakho. Sicela ushayele ku-(877) 807-4646 kusukela kwenye ifoni ukuze wenze kusebenze isevisi yakho ye-4G LTE bese uphinda uyazama futhi.

"Ukushaya kwe-Wi-Fi kukuvumela ukuthi wenze amakholi usebenzisa i-Wi-Fi uma inethiwekhi yeselula ingatholakali.
Ukuze usethe ukushaya kwe-Wi-Fi, kuzomele ufake ikheli lase-US. Leli kheli lizosetshenziswa amasevisi ezimo eziphuthumayo endaweni yakho uma wenza ikholi yesimo esiphuthumayo (engu-E911) nge-Wi-Fi kusukela kule foni phakathi kwase-US.
Sincoma ukuthi ushintshe leli kheli uma wenza amakholi usebenzisa inethiwekhi ehlukile ye-Wi-Fi ukuze ulwazi lwendawo yakho lunembe. Ungashintsha indawo yakho noma kunini ngokuya kumenyu yezilungiselelo zokushaya kwe-Wi-Fi."

OKUBALULEKILE - IKHELI LESIMO ESIPHUTHUMAYO ELINGU-911 LIYADINGEKA" Ukuze uvule ukushaya kwe-Wi-Fi, faka ikheli lase-U.S. lapho ufuna kuthunyelwe khona amasevisi esimo esiphuthumayo uma ushayela ku-911. Ungaya kuzilungiselelo uphinde ushintshe leli kheli noma kunini. Kubaluleke kakhulu ukubuyekeza leli kheli noma kunini lapho ushintsha khona indawo yakho."

IZEXWAYISO - IMIKHAWULO YEKHOLI YESIMO ESIPHUTHUMAYO ENGU-911" Uma ushayela ku-911, hlala utshela i-opharetha ukuthi ukuphi. Ikholi yakho ye-911 izoba nge-Wi-Fi kuphela uma inethiwekhi yeselula ingatholakali. Ikholi ye-911 eyenziwe nge-Wi-Fi ingalibaziseka noma ingaphumeleli; isibonelo, uma isistimu ye-911 ingaliboni ikheli, amandla ogesi enqamuka, noma ukuxhumeka kwakho kwe-Wi-Fi kungasebenzi. Amasevisi esimo esiphuthumayo azothunyelwa kukheli olinikeze ngaphezulu, ngakho-ke sicela ulibuyekeze njengoba ushintsha izindawo zakho."

"Asikwazanga ukuthola ikheli olifakile ngoba ikheli lomgwaqo alikwazanga ukutholwa, noma idolobha, isifunda, nekhodi ye-zip kungenzeka ingalungi.
Uma idolobha lakho, isifunda, ne-zip zingalungile thepha ku-%1$s, uma kungenjalo thepha ku-%2$s."
Asikwazanga ukuthola ikheli olifakile ngoba ikheli lomgwaqo alikwazanga ukutholwa, noma idolobha, isifunda, nekhodi ye-zip kungenzeka ayilungile.
Uma idolobha lakho, isifunda, ne-zip zingalungile thepha ku-%1$s, uma kungenjalo thepha ku-%2$s.
Ikheli elifakiwe alikwazanga ukuqinisekiswa abahlinzeki besevisi yesimo esiphuthumayo.
Ingabe uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukusebenzisa leli kheli kusimo esiphuthumayo?

"Idolobha, isifunda, noma ikhodi ye-zip oyifakile kungenzeka ingalungi.
Sicela uhlole ikheli uphinde uzame futhi."
Idolobha, isifunda, noma ikhodi ye-zip oyifakile kungenzeka ingalungi.
Sicela uhlole ikheli uphinde uzame futhi.
